title: Role Resolution: How the Team Instance is Built
summary: Understand the order: Team Template → Lifecycle Template → Context Team → Workflow; team instances are not retro‑updated.

steps.label: Build order
steps.action: When a process starts, Windchill resolves roles in this order: (1) Team Template adds roles and any mapped participants; (2) Lifecycle state adds any additional roles; (3) Context Team augments participants for roles already in the instance; (4) Workflow adds missing process roles.
steps.verify: Your team instance lists only roles from TT/LCT/WF; CT augments users but does not add new roles.

steps.label: No retro‑update
steps.action: Changing the team template or lifecycle later does not rewrite an already‑created team instance; update via Setup Participants or object details if needed.
steps.verify: Existing instances remain unchanged after template edits.
